sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowLeft, Eye, EyeOff } from 'lucide-react'; const StudentSignUp = ({ onLogin }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isStudent, setIsStudent] = useState(true); const [showPass, setShowPass] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: '', rollNo: '', department: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' }); const styles = { // 1. PAGE BACKGROUND (Centers the card) pageContainer: { minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#f1f5f9', // Light grey background outside the card display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif", padding: '20px' }, // 2. THE CARD (Compact & Centered) card: { backgroundColor: '#ffffff', width: '100%', maxWidth: '440px', // Limits width like your design image borderRadius: '24px', padding: '32px', boxShadow: '0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }, // Header inside card header: { textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '24px' }, title: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: '800', color: '#1e293b', marginBottom: '8px' }, subtitle: { fontSize: '14px', color: '#64748b' }, // Toggle Switch (Blue & Grey) toggleContainer: { display: 'flex', backgroundColor: '#f1f5f9', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '4px', marginBottom: '24px' }, toggleBtn: (active) => ({ flex: 1, padding: '10px', borderRadius: '10px', border: 'none', fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: '600', cursor: 'pointer', backgroundColor: active ? '#0ea5e9' : 'transparent', // Blue if active color: active ? '#fff' : '#64748b', transition: 'all 0.2s' }), // Form Fields form: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '16px' }, inputGroup: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '6px' }, label: { fontSize: '13px', fontWeight: '600', color: '#475569', marginLeft: '4px' }, input: { width: '100%', padding: '14px', borderRadius: '12px', border: '1px solid #e2e8f0', fontSize: '14px', outline: 'none', backgroundColor: '#f8fafc', color: '#1e293b', boxSizing: 'border-box' }, // Row for small inputs row: { display: 'flex', gap: '12px' }, col: { flex: 1 }, // Footer submitBtn: { width: '100%', padding: '16px', borderRadius: '12px', border: 'none', backgroundColor: '#0ea5e9', // Blue Button color: '#fff', fontSize: '16px', fontWeight: 'bold', cursor: 'pointer', marginTop: '10px', boxShadow: '0 4px 12px rgba(14, 165, 233, 0.3)' }, loginText: { textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '13px', color: '#64748b', marginTop: '20px' }, link: { color: '#0ea5e9', fontWeight: '700', cursor: 'pointer', textDecoration: 'none' } }; const handleChange = (e) => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); const handleSubmit = () => { onLogin({ name: formData.fullName || 'New User', email: formData.email, role: isStudent ? 'student' : 'teacher', college: 'Engineering Tech Institute' }); navigate('/'); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Create Account

Sign up to get started

{/* Toggle (Student/Teacher) */}
{/* Form */}
setShowPass(!showPass)}> {showPass ? : }
{/* Terms Checkbox */}
I agree to Terms & Privacy
Have an account? Login
); }; export default StudentSignUp;
